name: zendframework/zend-validator
description: provides a set of commonly needed validators

suggest.psr/http-message: psr/http-message, required when validating PSR-7 UploadedFileInterface instances via the Upload and UploadFile validators
suggest.zendframework/zend-db: Zend\Db component, required by the (No)RecordExists validator
suggest.zendframework/zend-filter: Zend\Filter component, required by the Digits validator
suggest.zendframework/zend-i18n: Zend\I18n component to allow translation of validation error messages
suggest.zendframework/zend-math: Zend\Math component, required by the Csrf validator
suggest.zendframework/zend-servicemanager: Zend\ServiceManager component to allow using the ValidatorPluginManager and validator chains
suggest.zendframework/zend-session: Zend\Session component, ^2.8; required by the Csrf validator
suggest.zendframework/zend-uri: Zend\Uri component, required by the Uri and Sitemap\Loc validators
